entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
